title: Dog Racer

title: Aurora
description: Reworking / Refactoring / Reskinning old vr interactions into a new app.
imageAlt: A person with tron-like hands reaches towards floating neon-outlined primitive shapes. Directly in front of them is a desk, with 3 buttons on. In the distance is a floating platform with a table on it. In the background, is a blue sky & clouds.
